abstract: Community leaders and residents in San Francisco protest after Archbishop Salvatore Cordileone's mandates that teachers at four Bay Area Catholic high schools cannot publicly challenge church's teachings; ban includes dogma condemning homosexuality and embryonic stem cell research.
lead_paragraph: The changes in the staff handbook, which say that teachers at Catholic high schools cannot challenge church teachings, including against homosexuality, have caused a backlash.

headline.main: Morals Clause in Catholic Schools Roils Bay Area
headline.print_headline: Morals Clause in Catholic Schools Roils Bay Area
headline.seo: Archbishop Cordileone of San Francisco Defends Changes

snippet: The changes in the staff handbook, which say that teachers at Catholic high schools cannot challenge church teachings, including against homosexuality, have caused a backlash.

keywords.value: United States Conference of Catholic Bishops
